short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to manage your Raizer.CC Wallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE: This is a public beta test. Please don't use too much money for testing it.

We created Raizer Wallet with the aim of helping users easily check cryptoasset balances within their wallet, sign messages as well as transactions.
